name: George W. FOCHT, Appellant, v. Warren S. STAMM and Helen W. Stamm

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: George W. FOCHT, Appellant, v. Warren S. STAMM and Helen W. Stamm.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Decree affirmed. Costs on appellant.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: John E. Ruth, Marx, Ruth, Binder, Ward & Crump, Reading, for appellant.
John H. Forry, Reading, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
344 A.2d 461
George W. FOCHT, Appellant, v. Warren S. STAMM and Helen W. Stamm.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Nov. 21, 1974.
Decided Oct. 3, 1975.
John E. Ruth, Marx, Ruth, Binder, Ward & Crump, Reading, for appellant.
John H. Forry, Reading, for appellees.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
